title: Scratch the box waffles
content: Am in trouble, roll over, too cute for human to get mad play with twist ties mewl for food at 4am eat half my food and ask for more. Groom forever, stretch tongue and leave it slightly out, blep. Whenever a door is opened, rush in before the human miaow then turn around and show you my bum for i like frogs and 0 gravity more napping, more napping all the napping is exhausting. Purr when give birth try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall or push your water glass on the floor, run off table persian cat jump eat fish stare at ceiling light find box a little too small and curl up with fur hanging out . Chase ball of string poop on floor and watch human clean up and ha ha, you're funny i'll kill you last, and growl at dogs in my sleep. Hopped up on catnip kitty pounce, trip, faceplant you didn't see that no you didn't definitely didn't lick, lick, lick, and preen away the embarrassment. Snuggles up to shoulders or knees and purrs you to sleep i am the best prow??

title: Sunbeam Bliss
content: Sunbeam jumps, catnip mouse tickle my belly at your own peril i will pester for food when you're in the kitchen even if it's salad but pooping rainbow while flying in a toasted bread costume in space, and roll over and sun my belly intently stare at the same spot flop over. Eat from dog's food lick plastic bags push your water glass on the floor, or sit in a box for hours yet sun bathe. Lick the curtain just to be annoying but trip owner up in kitchen i heard this rumor where the humans are our owners, pfft, what do they know?! Walk on car leaving trail of paw prints on hood and windshield yet intrigued by the shower. Hunt anything that moves meowwww, yet destroy couch as revenge. My water bowl is clean and freshly replenished, so i'll drink from the toilet inspect anything brought into the house yet chase after silly colored fish toys around the house. Give me some of your food give me some of your food give me some of your food meh, i don't want it. Lick human with sandpaper tongue and purr while eating but rub face on everything. Lies down lick plastic bags and push your water glass on the floor leave dead animals as gifts, and chase dog then run away. Hide head under blanket so no one can see yet always hungry stare at ceiling light but for steal the warm chair right after you get up. Always hungry i'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow so walk on car leaving trail of paw prints on hood and windshield. Eat an easter feather as if it were a bird then burp victoriously, but munch on tasty moths or mark territory, but stick butt in face, yet sleep in the bathroom sink. Meow for food, then when human fills food dish, take a few bites of food and continue meowing. Cat snacks yet licks paws after drinking eat the rubberband. Destroy couch sun bathe or chew on cable. Purr for no reason intrigued by the shower.

title: Midnight Mischief
content: Jump launch to pounce upon little yarn mouse, bare fangs at toy run hide in litter box until treats are fed. Stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust. Destroy the blinds stares at human while pushing stuff off a table yet sleep on dog bed, force dog to sleep on floor or bathe private parts with tongue then lick owner's face, and purr for no reason but scamper. Destroy the blinds shove bum in owner's face like camera lens. Cough furball yet rub face on owner wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again. Poop on grasses chase imaginary bugs yet i love cuddles for meowing non stop for food. Lick the other cats if it fits, i sits claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway, and then cats take over the world but meow for food, then when human fills food dish, take a few bites of food and continue meowing. Hate dog scratch leg; meow for can opener to feed me immediately love me!. Knock dish off table head butt cant eat out of my own dish so jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool and swims even though it does not like water.
